entry.title: WWDC 2019
entry.summary: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.…Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice。
entry.content: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.…Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice。

entry.title: WWDC 2018
entry.summary: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me ... Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful... that's what matters to me。
entry.content: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me ... Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful... that's what matters to me。

entry.title: WWDC 2017
entry.summary: We think basically you watch television to turn your brain off, and you work on your computer when you want to turn your brain on.
entry.content: We think basically you watch television to turn your brain off, and you work on your computer when you want to turn your brain on.

entry.title: WWDC 2016
entry.summary: There's a phrase in Buddhism, 'Beginner's mind.' It's wonderful to have a beginner's mind.
entry.content: There's a phrase in Buddhism, 'Beginner's mind.' It's wonderful to have a beginner's mind.

entry.title: WWDC 2015
entry.summary:
I think the greatest value of learning how to think.... I think everybody in this country should learn how to program a computer, should learn a computer language, because it teaches you how to think, it’s like going to law school, I don’t think anybody should be a lawyer, but I think going to law school may actually be useful coz it teaches you how to think in a certain way. In the same way the computer programming teaches you in a slightly different way how to think... And so … I view computer science as a liberal art. It should be something everybody takes in a year in their life, one of the courses they take is, you know learning how to program.
-------- Steve Jobs
entry.content:
I think the greatest value of learning how to think.... I think everybody in this country should learn how to program a computer, should learn a computer language, because it teaches you how to think, it’s like going to law school, I don’t think anybody should be a lawyer, but I think going to law school may actually be useful coz it teaches you how to think in a certain way. In the same way the computer programming teaches you in a slightly different way how to think... And so … I view computer science as a liberal art. It should be something everybody takes in a year in their life, one of the courses they take is, you know learning how to program.
-------- Steve Jobs

entry.title: WWDC 2014
entry.summary: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose。
entry.content: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose。

entry.title: 关于
entry.summary: 一个对着手机微笑的女孩，我也会猜测她微笑，是恋人的密语，还是朋友的问候，或许是看一段笑话，总之，很美。我想坐过去，但她的目光投过来，我又低下了头，像个犯错的孩子。
entry.content: 一个对着手机微笑的女孩，我也会猜测她微笑，是恋人的密语，还是朋友的问候，或许是看一段笑话，总之，很美。我想坐过去，但她的目光投过来，我又低下了头，像个犯错的孩子。
